subject: Chemistry
question_text: The following data were obtained during the first order thermal decomposition of a gas A S. No                 Time/s                 Total pressure/(atm) 1 . 0 0 . 1 2 . 115 0 . 28 The rate constant of the reaction is _______ × 10 -2 s -1 (nearest integer)
question_latex: The following data were obtained during the first order thermal decomposition of a gas A S. No                 $\frac{Time}{s}$                 Total pressure/(atm) 1 . 0 0 . 1 2 . 115 0 . 28 The rate constant of the reaction is _______ × 10 -2 s -1 (nearest integer)
